thread.title: Tom Brady shares adorable picture with his Mom
thread.title_full: Tom Brady shares adorable picture with his Mom

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: Tom Brady shares adorable picture with his Mom
text:
Tom Brady shares adorable picture with his Mom Tom Brady loves his Mom Post to Facebook Tom Brady shares adorable picture with his Mom Tom Brady loves his Mom  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/tom-brady-mom-dad-family-pitures-super-bowl-2017-51/   Join the Nation's Conversation   Tom Brady shares adorable picture with his Mom Luke Kerr-Dineen , USA TODAY Sports 8:32 a.m. ET Feb. 5, 2017 
Well, congratulations Tom Brady, because you've just won the hearts of mothers everywhere. 
In the build-up to the big game, lots of questions have centered around Tom Brady's father, Tom Brady Sr. 
It started when Sr. spoke out against Goodell and the "witch hunt" that was Deflategate. It continued when Tom reportedly banned his father from speaking to the media , and then culminated when Brady got emotional speaking about his father's influence. Tom Brady gets emotional when asked who his hero is.His answer? His dad. pic.twitter.com/wFL299bieG â€” Henry McKenna (@McKennAnalysis) January 31, 2017 
And now, it's his mom's turn. The night before Super Bowl 51, the two Toms locked Galynn in a "sandwich kiss". A photo posted by Tom Brady (@tombrady) on Feb 4, 2017 at 4:04pm PST
